source: After landing on a mysterious island close to Atlantis, the remaining Atlanteans struggle to make a new home for themselves.
target: Nakon pristajanja na mistični otok u blizini Atlantide, ostatak Atlantiđana se muči stvoriniti novi dom.

source: Cornmeal is produced in a mill out of corn and is one of three parts of the Atlantean bread produced in bakeries.
target: Kukuruzno brašno se proizvodi od kukuruza u mlinovima i jedan je od tri vrste kruha koji se proizvode u pekarama širom Atlantide.

source: Produces armor for the soldiers.
target: Proizvodi štit za vojnike

source: Produces armor for the soldiers.
target: Proizvodi štit za vojnike

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Crnokorijensko brašno se proizvodi u mlinovima za crni korijen. Koristi se za pečenje ukusnog kruha.

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Nadajmo se da nas Lanissa – vojskovođa koja kontrolira dvorac – još nije otkrila. Možda imamo šansu osvojiti tu močnu utvrdu bez puno žrtava! Prevažno je da ju osvojimo. Ona je ključna u našoj budućoj vladavini nad otokom!

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Nadajmo se da nas Lanissa – vojskovođa koja kontrolira dvorac – još nije otkrila. Možda imamo šansu osvojiti tu močnu utvrdu bez puno žrtava! Prevažno je da ju osvojimo. Ona je ključna u našoj budućoj vladavini nad otokom!

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Pošaljite geologa da istraži mjesto prije nego što napravite bunar ili rudnik.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Pošaljite geologa da istraži mjesto prije nego što napravite bunar ili rudnik.

source: %s has won the game. Congratulations!
target: %s je pobijednik. Čestitamo!

source: This is an endless game without rules.
target: Ovo je partija bez završetka i nema pravila.

source: Endless Game (no fog)
target: Partija bez završetka (nema magle)

source: This is an endless game without rules. Fog of war is disabled.
target: Ovo je partija bez završetka i nema pravila. Magla je onemogućena.

source: The game will end in %s.
target: Partija će završiti za %s.

source: Return to the single player menu
target: Povratak na izbornik lokalne igre

source: Do you really want to delete this game?
target: Sigurno želite obrisati ovu spremljenu igru?

source: Do you really want to delete this replay?
target: Sigurno želite obrisati ovu snimku?

source: Show seafaring messages only
target: Prikaži samo pomorske poruke

source: Build medium building
target: Sagradi srednju građevinu

source: Show original map names
target: Prikaži izvorna imena
